name: Scary Granny Doll Horror House
description:
Welcome to "Scary Granny Doll Horror House" Game is a new addictive sneaky game that will keep you playing for hours nonstop!

Your main objective is to get out of the house as fast as you can. But, you will have to be very careful because Granny has locked you in the house with his creepy doll.

Sounds easy? Would you be able to escape from the granny house without attracting the attention of the grandma's doll in this creepy horror game?

You have 6 minutes to escape from the house without to awake the creepy and scary granny's doll who is in the haunted house.

Granny doll is a cursed doll possessed by an evil spirit who has invoke by the Granny.
